_sText:
Version b3 is out as of 11 PM Pacific on July 3, 2008.

Numerous improvements have been made, most notably the map's appearance.

Not-so-detailed changelog
-----------------------------
b3)
-The entire map now has a haunted house theme
-Very improved lighting
-"CREDITS" text no longer casts shadows
-Changed first trap's walls to boxes
-Replaced bullseye targets with laser targeting
-Changed the grenade trap to have crates and lowered the starting position to make the trap deadlier
-Added more to the sliderace's wall, so terrorists can't time the sliderace trap to kill you as you pass
-Increased the size of the lightning trap
-Fixed the exploit that allowed players to get weapons from the end of the map
-Added free pointless weapons on top of the crate
-Fixed a slight spacing problem with the spikes on the stairs
-Removed the helicopter
-Tightened the hallways of the 2nd floor to be equal with the 1st floor
-Changed the appearance of the teleporter trap
-Changed the turret trap's doors from glass to match the sliderace's...it's going back to something transparent for b4
-Added a few more nails on the hammer trap
-Changed how the final trap spins to force the player being knocked off the platform
-Made the glass wall near the T stairs break sooner
-Changed the buttons to much nicer-looking ones, although they still lack an on/off light
-Made slight visual changes to the fire and gas fun box buttons
